metadata.title: CVE-2018-11207 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A division by zero was discovered in H5D__chunk_init in H5Dchunk.c in theHDF HDF5 1.10.2 library. It could allow a remote denial of service attack.

criterions.comment: hdf5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
